subject: Blacks
Football
lead_paragraph: Doug Williams, the first African-American quarterback to win the Super Bowl, said the N.F.L. has reached the point that “nobody is going to pass up a guy who can play” based on skin color.
snippet: Doug Williams, the first African-American quarterback to win the Super Bowl, said the N.F.L. has reached the point that “nobody is going to pass up a guy who can play” based on skin color.
